Package uk.ac.ed.inf

Class Order

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.Order
public final class Order extends Object
This class is used to store orders made, once retrieved from the REST Server

  • Field Details

      public static HashMap<Restaurant,List<String>> restaurantMenuMap

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(String orderNo, String orderDate, String customer, String creditCardNumber, String creditCardExpiry, String cvv, int priceTotalInPence, List<String> orderItems)
      Parameters:
      orderNo - the number used to identify a unique order
      orderDate - the date the order was placed
      customer - name of the person that placed the order
      creditCardNumber - the credit card number used by the customer to place the order
      creditCardExpiry - the expiry date of the credit card used for the order
      cvv - the cvv number on the credit card used for the order
      priceTotalInPence - the total price of paid by the customer for the order
      orderItems - list of the items in the order

      Throws:
